comment.body: Just learned about your ZeroMux project, it looks really interesting.
@Th3B3st: ZeroNet really must be improved, but if you read this issues you'll see that they are funny because of their absurdness.
Great, thanks for your good work! ZeroNet gets better and better.

I'm also sad that I live in Russia, but because officials don't act hard enough. I want mass genocide of homosexuals. This filth has no place in here. And fag sympathisers have to be exterminated as well.
Kadyrov did nothing wrong. Faggots all have to be executed. And people who defend them will get the rope as well.
